explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning algorithms including LSTM and XGBoost for evaluating potential market movements and generating forecasting information.
explanations.clustering: The paper discusses the development of a clustering-based algorithm for constructing joint ellipsoidal uncertainty sets to reduce conservatism in portfolio optimization.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions the use of Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) as one of the machine learning algorithms employed in the study.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is directly referenced in the abstract as part of the machine learning techniques used for market movement evaluation and forecasting.
